what: Why we do not use .github/pkg.lock right now
title: CI Notes
text: removed pak lockfile caused GitHub Actions failures macOS (Apple Silicon). pak attempted download pinned binaries (example, xfun) download failed, stopped CI R CMD check run. current stage battplot, prioritise stable CI pinned dependency installs.

title: CI Notes
text: Reintroduce lockfile : - dependency set stable, - CI consistently green across OS targets, - want reproducible builds releases. reintroduce , also add scheduled workflow refresh lockfile monthly test macOS, Windows, Linux.

title: Battlytics Visual Style Guide (battplot)
text: guide defines Battlytics charts look read. goal technical readable, one clear claim per chart.

title: Battlytics Visual Style Guide (battplot)
text: Primary: - Navy: #001F35 - Deep navy: #001528 Accents: - Cyan: #16ABE9 - Blue: #0175AA Neutrals: - Ice: #D9F2F7 - White: #FFFFFF Rules: - Use deep navy titles, axis labels, body text. - Use cyan main series. - Use blue secondary series. - use 4 colours one chart. - Avoid red unless highlighting risk failure.

title: Battlytics Visual Style Guide (battplot)
text: Defaults: - Font family: sans - Base size: 12 Rules: - Title claim, label. - Subtitle adds context one line. - Caption always includes source. - Avoid caps.

title: Battlytics Visual Style Guide (battplot)
text: Every chart : - Title: claim - Subtitle: context - Caption: source notes Use helpers: - theme_battlytics() - batt_labs() - batt_caption() - scale_color_battlytics() / scale_fill_battlytics() Recommended caption format: - Source: ... | Notes: ...

title: Battlytics Visual Style Guide (battplot)
text: : - Annotate key insight. - Label peaks, troughs, breakpoints. - Keep annotations short factual. Don’t: - Add multiple callouts. - Use long paragraphs inside plot. - Hide uncertainty matters.

title: Battlytics Visual Style Guide (battplot)
text: Always show units. Start bar charts zero. Avoid dual axes. smooth model, state Notes. data incomplete, state coverage (time window, sample size).

title: Battlytics Visual Style Guide (battplot)
text: Minor gridlines . Vertical major gridlines . Horizontal major gridlines faint. plot looks busy, reduce categories simplify message.

title: Battlytics Visual Style Guide (battplot)
text: Landscape (recommended): - Function: batt_save_linkedin() - Size: 12 x 6.75 inches - DPI: 300 Square: - Function: batt_save_square() - Size: 8 x 8 inches - DPI: 300 File naming: - YYYY-MM_topic_slug.png - Example: 2026-01_grid_connections_readiness.png

title: Battlytics Visual Style Guide (battplot)
text: monthly post ships : 1) One hero chart (made battplot) 2) Three bullet insights (numbers first) 3) One dashboard angle (monitor weekly) 4) One action decision makers 5) short methods block (assumptions caveats)
